name: refactor_generic_names
input:
Refactor these names to encode intent and role instead of implementation:

1. `VAR userArray = []`
2. `FUNCTION handleData(data)`
3. `CONST VALUE = 10` (referring to minimum age)

expected.focus: Evaluate whether the response demonstrates the skill principle

name: identify_naming_violations
input: Why does the name `saveUserAndLogActivity` violate the Naming as Design principle?

expected.focus: Evaluate whether the response demonstrates the skill principle
